name: Finish the Damn Game
description:
You play as a troubled indie game developer, who has no shortage of game ideas, but struggles with depression, laziness and lack of self esteem. Your goal is to just just Finish the Damn Game before the year is over. 

This was our studio's first ever game and first game jam entry (JimJam2018 hosted by Tim Ruswick).

"I finished a damn game!" - Tim Ruswick, Game Dev Underground
